## 🚀 Features
- Get a List of Marvel characters
- Search for specific character
- Read character description
- Get all comics related to the selected character
- Create a list of your favorite characters

## 🛠️ Installation Steps

1. Clone the repository

```Bash
git clone https://github.com/LucasFelipeTimoteo/marvel-strike-team.git
```

2. Dowload dependencies
```Bash
npm install
```

## 🔥 Get Started

1. Go to project folder
```Bash
cd frontend
```

2. Start React app 
```Bash
npm start
```

## 🧪 Tests

1. Run unit tests
```Bash
npm test
```

2. Run integration/E2E tests
```Bash
npm run test:cypress
```

3. Run all tests (units and integration/E2E) at once
```Bash
npm run test:all
```

4. Tips
- Avoid running Integration/E2E tests if your Internet connection is not stable as this could result in unexpected errors
- Avoid interacting with the application from within the test browser while the integration/E2E tests are running
- To manually test some functionality, prefer to use the real application running in your browser
- If an Integration/E2E test unexpectedly failed try running the tests again

5. Integration/E2E interface (Cypress interface)
- When running the Integration/E2E tests, the following interface will appear:
![Cypress interface](https://github.com/LucasFelipeTimoteo/marvel-strike-team/blob/main/frontend/.github/images/cypress-interface.png)

- To run all integration/E2E tests at once, click in "Run Nº integration specs"
![Cypress interface to run all tests](https://github.com/LucasFelipeTimoteo/marvel-strike-team/blob/main/frontend/.github/images/cypress-interface-run-all-tests.png)

- To run specific tests, just choose from the list
![Cypress interface to run all tests](https://github.com/LucasFelipeTimoteo/marvel-strike-team/blob/main/frontend/.github/images/cypress-interface-run-specific-tests.png)

## 👷 Built with
- [React](https://reactjs.org/)
- [Node.js](https://nodejs.org/en/) (v14.15.4)
- [Javascript](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Guide/Introduction)
- [Typescript](https://www.typescriptlang.org/)
- [Material-UI](https://v4.mui.com/)
- [Axios](https://axios-http.com/)
- [Cypress](https://www.cypress.io/)
- [Jest](https://jestjs.io/)
